title: Low frame rates on sensors with 1.8.6/2.6.5

content.raw:
Reported by @faller in the [forum](https://www.theroboticschallenge.org/forum/default.aspx?Function_fst=ViewThread&ThreadID_fin=319):

Images and Laser aren't created at fixed and reliable rates. When subscribed 2 days ago I got 40Hz laser, 30Hz cameras.

They are all at low rates e.g 10Hz. I suspect that you may have also turned of the GPUs on the sim machines.

Just do the following:

~~~
rostopic hz /sandia_hands/r_hand/camera/left/image_raw
rostopic hz /multisense_sl/laser/scan -w 20

rostopic hz /multisense_sl/camera/left/image_raw
subscribed to [/multisense_sl/camera/left/image_raw]
average rate: 11.321
min: 0.027s max: 0.100s std dev: 0.02182s window: 10
average rate: 11.021
min: 0.027s max: 0.100s std dev: 0.01566s window: 20
average rate: 10.836
min: 0.005s max: 0.273s std dev: 0.04332s window: 29
average rate: 10.728
min: 0.005s max: 0.273s std dev: 0.03722s window: 39
average rate: 10.696
~~~
content.html:
Reported by @faller in the forum:

Images and Laser aren't created at fixed and reliable rates. When subscribed 2 days ago I got 40Hz laser, 30Hz cameras.

They are all at low rates e.g 10Hz. I suspect that you may have also turned of the GPUs on the sim machines.

Just do the following:

rostopic hz /sandia_hands/r_hand/camera/left/image_raw
rostopic hz /multisense_sl/laser/scan -w 20

rostopic hz /multisense_sl/camera/left/image_raw
subscribed to [/multisense_sl/camera/left/image_raw]
average rate: 11.321
min: 0.027s max: 0.100s std dev: 0.02182s window: 10
average rate: 11.021
min: 0.027s max: 0.100s std dev: 0.01566s window: 20
average rate: 10.836
min: 0.005s max: 0.273s std dev: 0.04332s window: 29
average rate: 10.728
min: 0.005s max: 0.273s std dev: 0.03722s window: 39
average rate: 10.696
